Trade/Device Name(s): cobas Influenza A/B & RSV nucleic acid test for use on the cobas Liat System
cobas® Influenza A/B & RSV Nucleic Acid Test for Use on the cobas® Liat® System
Regulation Name(s): Respiratory Viral Panel Multiplex Nucleic Acid Assay
Real Time Nucleic Acid Amplification System
Specimen Container(s): cobas® Influenza A/B & RSV assay tube
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for cobas Influenza A/B & RSV nucleic acid test on the cobas Liat System for multiplex detection of respiratory viruses using automated RT-PCR.
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative detection and discrimination of Influenza A virus, Influenza B virus, and RSV RNA in nasopharyngeal swab specimens from patients with signs and symptoms of respiratory infection, as an aid in differential diagnosis, not intended to detect Influenza C.
